definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人观看了在足球城体育场举行的世界杯决赛。

sentences.english: Nani's passage to the World Cup with Portugal was plain sailing by comparison with Evra's exertions.
sentences.chinese: 纳尼进入世界杯比起埃弗拉来讲就顺理成章的多。
1998年世界杯体操赛平衡木冠军。

sentences.english: Both Vela and Dos Santos are currently preparing to star for Mexico in the World Cup finals.
sentences.chinese: 贝拉和多斯最近正在为世界杯努力着。

sentences.english: And of course there were a number of location-based searches surrounding the World Cup, which took place in South Africa over the summer.
sentences.chinese: 当然，还有大量的关于夏季南非世界杯的本地搜索。

sentences.english: Among those whose conversations were monitored is Massimo De Santis, the ref Italy is sending to the World Cup this summer .
sentences.chinese: 其中包括德桑蒂斯，今年意大利选派到世界杯的裁判。

sentences.english: We lost two or three early games in the World Cup, but we bounced back.
sentences.chinese: 在世界杯比赛中我们先输了几场，但后来又赢回来了。

sentences.english: It was Fabiano's third goal at this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 这也是法比亚诺在本届世界杯的第3粒入球。

sentences.english: I know we were moved because of the World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我们被赶出来是因为世界杯。

sentences.english: A serious low for Beckham was at the 1998 World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆的最低谷是在1998年的世界杯。

sentences.english: World Cup fever and Neymarmania have literally gone to some Brazilians' heads.
sentences.chinese: 世界杯热潮和内马尔热都跑到巴西人的脑袋上了。

sentences.english: As for bidding for the World Cup, we cut off ourselves before others cut us off.
sentences.chinese: 关于申办世界杯，我们是没被人宫先自宫。

sentences.english: Argentina are the unknown package of this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷是这届世界杯上的一个未知数。

sentences.english: It was Spain's fourth straight one-nothing victory in this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 这是西班牙连续第四一个没有在本届世界杯上的胜利。

sentences.english: Humiliated England loses out again, refuses to congratulate Russia.
sentences.chinese: 英国申办世界杯失利给赢家俄罗斯冷脸。

sentences.english: Ghana has become the first African team to win the Under-20 World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 迦纳成为首个赢得20岁以下世界杯的足球队。

definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
abbr. for 國際足球聯合會|国际足球联合会, FIFA, international federation of football associations
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
